*div1 type="summary"* *p*John Irwin to —— Chapman, February 1, 1834. Concerning draft drawn in Austin's favor.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
[*p*February 1, 1834?]*/p* *p*Dear *person_mentioned*Chapman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Colonel Austin*/person_mentioned* gave me a draft on*person_mentioned* Dr. Grant*/person_mentioned* for 200$ drawn by*person_mentioned* Mr. Parrot*/person_mentioned* payable in *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*, as *person_mentioned*Colonel A*/person_mentioned* was arrested he requested the money to be put in *location_mentioned*Monterey */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Dr. G*/person_mentioned*. sent the money there but it could not arrive before *person_mentioned*Colonel A*/person_mentioned* left. He is now on his way to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*and wants the money, in his present situation if you can give it to him he will give you an order to receive the same Sum in *location_mentioned*Monterey*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Dr.] *person_mentioned*Grant*/person_mentioned* and myself will feel obliged if you can confer this favor.*/p*
*p*I write this because *person_mentioned*Rolan */person_mentioned*is [go]ne to *location_mentioned*Parras*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jn° Irwin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
